name: My Ancient Creature Cannot Be This Cute?!
name_original: My Ancient Creature Cannot Be This Cute?!
description:
Have you ever wonder what it's like to have a mythological ancient creature as your pet? Look no further!

My Ancient Creature Cannot Be This Cute?! is a turn-based card game ancient mythical monster simulator made during UOW Malaysia KDU Sem Jam in 48 hours. 

The theme for the game jam was ANCIENT.

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING!

MADE BY

Yue  Min Jun
